content.question: Based on the map, which of the following explains the similarities of the world regions where at least 51 percent of women work in agriculture?

choices.label: These regions are near the equator, in climate zones with high temperatures.
These regions are in the Southern Hemisphere, in temperate climate zones.
These regions are composed of less-developed countries with small rural populations.
These regions are composed of more-developed countries with large urban populations.
These regions are composed of less-developed countries with large rural populations.

content.answer: These regions are composed of less-developed countries with large rural populations.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Compare patterns and trends in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data to draw conclusions.
